title: The Chimp Paradox: How Our Impulses and Emotions Can Determine Success and Happiness and How We Can Control Them
description: Leading consultant psychiatrist Steve Peters knows more than anyone how impulsive behaviour or nagging self-doubt can impact negatively on our professional and personal lives. In this, his first book, Steve shares his phenomenally successful mind-management programme that has been used to help elite athletes and senior managers alike to conquer their fears and operate with greater control, focus and confidence.
author: Steve   Peters
